name: I'm a love interest in my Childhood Friend's reverse harem!!! - Demo
name_original: I'm a love interest in my Childhood Friend's reverse harem!!! - Demo
description:
A not-so-generic otome game with BL possibilities.  

 Instead of playing the heroine and choosing between several men that have typical dating-sim personalities, you play as the childhood friend. That's right! The route that's usually the easiest to complete is no longer available.  You (Geum Park) are thrust into the world of a reverse harem, where your precious childhood friend (Emily Carter) is being hit on by two of your classmates (Ao Yazawa and Hong Yang Chan). You can choose to either play the role of a love interest and try to win the heroine's heart, or... you can play your own game and try to make the two boys fall for you instead! The choice is yours!

Note: The game takes place in Australia, so there are times when the characters may say things that seem a little odd. 

This is currently just a demo, work on the full game is still in production.

Demo Features:
- A spin on your everyday otome game
- BxB and BxG routes to play
- Three romanceable characters (2 male 1 female)
- Approx. 3500 w for the demo (~20% of the full game)
- Animated chibis and transitions
- Unfinished backgrounds

Goals for the Final Game:
- Aiming for a December 2019 release
- 17k+ words
- Mini Games 
- 15+ CG scenes
- At least 5 different endings
- Secondary outfits for sprites
- Completely original music and SFX if kickstarter is successful
- Additional romance characters if kickstarter is successful
